California

Cryptocurrency-focused PACs have spent
$17,700,409
to influence 2024 elections in California

By race

Senate
FairShake spent $10,044,813 to oppose Katie Porter in the non-partisan primary.
Katie Porter was defeated in the non-partisan primary.

House District 17
Protect Progress spent $108,545 to support Ro Khanna in the general election.
Ro Khanna won the general election.

House District 22
FairShake spent $1,306,862 to support David G. Valadao in the general election.
David G. Valadao won the general election.

House District 27
FairShake spent $1,012,931 to support Mike Garcia in the general election.
Mike Garcia was defeated in the general election.

House District 34
Protect Progress spent $511,329 to support Jimmy Gomez in the general election.
Jimmy Gomez won the general election.

House District 40
FairShake spent $1,924,213 to support Young Kim in the non-partisan primary and general election.
Young Kim won the general election.

House District 45
FairShake spent $2,791,716 to support Michelle Steel in the general election.
Michelle Steel was defeated in the general election.
